snippet.title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 - Official Game Trailer - Nintendo E3 2017
snippet.description:
Explore an endless ocean of clouds, where the last remnants of civilization live on the backs of colossal beasts called Titans. Experience the story of Rex and his new friend, Pyra, a mysterious being known as a Blade who grants him tremendous power. Together, search for Pyra’s long lost home Elysium, the ultimate paradise for all of humanity. Xenoblade Chronicles 2 is available now on Nintendo Switch!

Follow Nintendo E3 Coverage! http://e3.nintendo.com

#NintendoSwitch #XenobladeChronicles2 #E32017
